assertion.label: Change Details
assertion.name: change_details
assertion.value: This article has been retracted. Please see the Retraction Notice for more detail:

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflicts of interest regarding this work.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The dataset analyzed during the current study is restricted due to participant confidentially. Restrictions apply to the availability of these data, which were used under license for the current study, and so are not entirely publicly available. However, the variation data reported in this paper have been deposited in the Genome Variation Map (Song et al. CitationRef removed) in the BIG Data Center (Members BIGDC CitationRef removed), Beijing Institute of Genomics (BIG), Chinese Academy of Sciences, under accession number GVM000031 and can be publicly accessed at ExternalRef removed.
